DOC.brief_summary: This study aim compare efficacy safety tacrolimus/methotrexate cyclosporine/methotrexate graft versus host disease prophylaxis paediatric allogeneic hematopoietic stem cell transplantation patient .
DOC.brief_title: Tacrolimus/Methotrexate Versus Cyclosporine/Methotrexate Prophylaxis Graft Versus Host Disease
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis hematological malignancy Age 18 year old Serum bilirubin le 1.5 X upper limit normal Aspartate transaminase , Alanine transaminase le 2.5 X upper limit normal Alkaline phosphatase le 2.5 X upper limit normal Serum creatinine le 1.5 X upper limit normal Agrees participate , informed consent sign Evidence HIV infection Documented uncontrolled disease ( infection ) Prior transplantation ( hematopoietic stem cell solid organ )
